thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 3 of 113
thread.title: Mary Korkor
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Mary Korkor

author: Mary Korkor
title: Mary Korkor
text: I have shopped for optics for birding and find this place is the BEST! The knowledgable staff is so helpful. They understand birding, know their stock and the options out there, work with you in your price range to find the best options. The company is family owned and supports the community by giving back. I have purchased two different binocs, tripods and my Swarovski scope from them and and happy with all. For personalized service and quality, this is the BEST!!!!
